body: @Jorghi12 MIOPEN_LIBRARIES and HIP_HCC_LIBRARIES have been used by hip's own cmake files but there are some bugs in them that have been pointed out in my comments so we can not directly use these. And as the cmake files are merging together, and caffe2 has been merged into the pytorch repo, I think using PYTORCH as the prefix is ok?
